title: Frames locked to 60, drops to 57 sometimes
body:
Since today my game's fps is locked to 60 and occasionally drops to 55-57. Normally I get 300+ fps.

This has never happened to me before and my framerate isn't capped, nor is vsync on.

I already tried to update my graphics card drivers and repair League of Legends, but that didn't help.

How can I fix this?

[Here's what dxdiag says](http://pastebin.com/D5fwfu2y)

I'm running a GTX960 and all settings are max.

Thanks.

**[EDIT 1]**
I just tried putting my settings to the lowest possible, still stuck at 60 fps.

replies.body: This may be due to outdated drivers, or something else.  Go over the steps in our [FPS issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting) guide to rule out some possibilities and hopefully get you fixed up.  Let me know if you have any questions!
Thanks for your reply, but unfortunately none of them helped. I still have the issue.

Thanks for the update.  When you have some time, download our  [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752674-Network-System-and-League-of-Legends-Logs), which will automatically download a set of logs which will provide more context.  Attach it in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new), and our tech team can dig deeper into this.  We'll respond to your ticket asap!
I made a support ticket, thanks for your time :)
Same issue here. I get 200fps normally and now I get below 69 fps average. Not normal.
